description: This file performs audio sentiment analysis by fetching an audio file, processing it with an agent that uses a Gemini model, and printing responses related to the sentiment and additional information about the audio conversation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with media and models to perform tasks such as sentiment analysis.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A Google model used for processing and analyzing media content.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the agent, optionally with media content and streaming.
